sense.gloss: looking up to a person as one's own master or model, being influenced by a person through his works, idolizing
graceful, ladylike, modest, gentle, polite, quiet, well-mannered, refined (behavior)
ladylike, in the manner of a lady
court ladies' residence (in the inner Heian Palace)
graceful, ladylike, modest, gentle, polite, quiet, well-mannered, refined (behavior)

sdata.j: ↑淑子↑↓としこ↓は↑安西↑↓あんざい↓↑家↑↓か↓の↑人間↑↓にんげん↓だ。
↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓が↑淑女↑↓しゅくじょ↓であるように、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑紳士↑↓しんし↓だ。
sdata.e: As she is a lady, so he is a gentleman.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はどこから↑見↑↓み↓てもイギリスの↑淑女↑↓しゅくじょ↓だ。
sdata.e: She's every bit an English lady.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑淑女↑↓しゅくじょ↓であり、↑淑女↑↓しゅくじょ↓としての↑扱↑↓あつか↓いを↑期待↑↓きたい↓している。
sdata.e: She is a lady and expects to be treated as such.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑淑女↑↓しゅくじょ↓であり、そのように↑待遇↑↓たいぐう↓されるべきである。
sdata.e: She is a lady, and ought to be treated as such.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑淑女↑↓しゅくじょ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓でも↑際立↑↓きわだ↓った↑淑女↑↓しゅくじょ↓である。
sdata.e: She is a lady among ladies.

words.gloss: looking up to a person as one's own master or model, being influenced by a person through his works, idolizing
graceful, ladylike, modest, gentle, polite, quiet, well-mannered, refined (behavior)
